name: arctic-jumper
description: Arctic Jumper: a game where you jump over things!

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . "Arctic Jumper" --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=icons/logo.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName="Matthew Carvalho-Dagenais" --version-string.FileDescription="Jump through the arctic!" --version-string.ProductName="Arctic Jumper"
scripts.installer-mac: electron-installer-dmg ./release-builds/"Arctic Jumper-darwin-x64"/"Arctic Jumper.app" "Arctic Jumper Installer" --out=release-builds/"Arctic Jumper-darwin-x64" --icon=./icons/install.icns

author: Matthew Carvalho-Dagenais
